subject: Philosophy
title: Yin and Yang
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Yin and Yang.

hook.text: Light needs dark. Hot needs cold. Without opposites, neither side exists.

buildup.text: Yin and yang represent the idea that reality is made of complementary opposites.

discovery.text: Yin is passive, dark, receptive. Yang is active, bright, creative. Each contains the seed of the other.

twist.text: They aren't enemies. They depend on each other. A world of only light would be just as blind as only darkness.

climax.text: Health, relationships, and societies all break down when yin and yang fall out of balance.

quiz.question: What is the relationship between yin and yang?
options: They are complementary opposites that depend on each other
Yin is good and yang is evil
